# [Interview #1088: WoR Signing Report - Argent, Entry #8](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1088#8)

#### Question

If Nightblood is on Roshar, what happened to Vasher?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Well, look really closely at this book.
